item.title: US allies push back on Greenland at Davos ahead of Trump address
item.description: Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney added his voice to the condemnation of U.S. President Donald Trump's efforts to acquire Greenland.

item.title: WATCH: TikToker lands big break with jingle for TV commercial
item.description: Dr. Pepper licensed the jingle from Romeo Bingham for its ad during the College Football National Championship game.

item.title: WATCH: City mourns its rare albino alligator
item.description: This past week in San Francisco, thousands gathered outside of an aquarium to celebrate one of its residents, an alligator named Claude who died in De...

item.title: WATCH: ‘Bridgerton’ cast hints at what’s to come in season 4
item.description: “Bridgerton” season 4 will roll out in two parts, with the first four episodes premiering Jan. 29 and the remaining episodes arriving Feb. 26.

item.title: House Republicans set to move forward with holding Clintons in contempt of Congress
